price: 25. Kuma maqlaan (Jannada) hadal macno darro ah iyo denbi midna.
arabic: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna fīhā laghwan walā tathīman
